alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 03 at 1:56AM PST until January 04 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast and Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 3 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range
